price: "O Musa", reče On, "Ja sam tebe, doista, nad drugima poslanicama Svojim i govorom Svojim odabranim učinio. Ono što ti dajem uzmi i zahvalan budi!"
arabic: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāmūsā innī iṣ'ṭafaytuka ʿalā al-nāsi birisālātī wabikalāmī fakhudh mā ātaytuka wakun mina al-shākirīna
